description:
Control all your media players from one beautiful interface in your GNOME panel.
- Play, pause, skip tracks, and see album art without opening apps.
- Works great with Spotify, browsers, VLC, and more.
- Handles multiple players gracefully with smart tab switching.
- Rotation animation for album art when music is playing.
- Preferences allow copying donation links to clipboard.
name: Advanced Media Controller
